homeIntroBody: We are so excited to celebrate our special day with our family and friends. This website contains wedding day details, travel information, and much more - check back for updates!
ourStoryBody: It started with a coffee shop mishap...
venueDescription: We'll be celebrating at The Barn at the BOG!

faqs.question: What is the dress code?
faqs.answer: Black Tie Optional. We ask that men wear a tuxedo or dark suit and tie, and women wear an evening gown or midi-length cocktail dress.

faqs.question: Are children invited?
faqs.answer: While we love your little ones, our wedding is going to be an adults-only event so that everyone can relax and enjoy the evening.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is ample free parking available at the venue for all guests.

faqs.question: Can I bring a date?
faqs.answer: We have a strict guest list to stay within our venue's capacity. Our wedding is strictly RSVP only. We will only be able to accommodate those listed on your invitation.

faqs.question: Where are you registered?
faqs.answer: Your presence is enough of a present to us! However, for those who wish to contribute, we are registered at Target and Crate & Barrel.

scheduleEvents.title: Guest Arrival
scheduleEvents.description: Please arrive at the Garden Courtyard...
